commit.message: Add additional tags to SQLAlchemy instrumentation (#107)

Fix db_span function of _dbapi2 to work with bytes (#105)

For Python 3, passing sql_statement in the form of bytes to the
db_span function of _dbapi2 module leads to raising of a TypeError.

This fix adds safe decoding when it's necessary.

Fix handling of missing psycopg2 module (#104)

Execution of install_all_patches in the environment with no
psycopg2/psycopg2-binary leads to raising of an ImportError.

These changes also:

 - add test for missing modules handling
Add missing import to the Tornado example

commit.message:
Improve support for Boto 3 and S3 (#102)

This commit adds support for Boto 3 clients including
enhanced support for the S3 client.

These changes also:

 - replace amazon/dynamodb-local docker image with
   localstack/localstack docker image for tests

 - fix test for SQLAlchemy

Refactor MySQLdb hook (#100)

These changes also:

 - Add a basic test for the MySQLdb hook

 - Make pytest shows skip reasons

Refactor SQLAlchemy hook (#98)

These changes also:

 - Add a basic test for the SQLAlchemy hook

 - Clean up boilerplate code

Fix span context propagation for Celery (#97)

I found that for Celery 4 a request still has the headers attribute,
so we have to check if it is not None.
Using getattr in case headers will be removed in the future.

These changes also:

 - Remove test_celery_run_without_parent_span in favor of _test_with_regular_client

 - Fix stopping of Celery 3 test workers

 - Add --cov-append in order to have more precise coverage reports.
   Currently, for each Travis CI job
   we have coverage for the last tox run only
   (for tests with Celery 4, not with Celery 3).
Use tox for CI instead of travis's matrix (#96)

Set deploy username and password

Signed-off-by: Yuri Shkuro <ys@uber.com>

Add deploy section into .travis.yml (#94)

The main purpose of this commit is to simplify the deployment flow.
Note that user and encrypted password must be set properly.

Useful links:
 - https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/encryption-keys
 - https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment/pypi
 - https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/deployment#examples-of-conditional-deployment

Fixes #92

Fix coveralls/boto3 dependency conflict (#93)

Both coveralls and boto3 require urllib3.
But for Python 2.7 coveralls requires urllib3[secure]<1.25,>=1.21.1
when boto3 requires botocore which requires urllib3>=1.20,<1.26.

Pip installs version that's required first
because it has no dependency resolver.
See https://github.com/pypa/pip/issues/988 for details.

So we have to move coveralls upper to fix the issue.

Fixes #91

These changes also:

 - Unpin pytest

Support non TornadoScopeManager in traced_function decorator (#86)

* Support non TornadoScopeManager in traced_function decorator

Signed-off-by: Vasilii Novikov <novikov.vz@gmail.com>

* Fix tests for traced_function with coroutine

Signed-off-by: Vasilii Novikov <novikov.vz@gmail.com>

* Move dummy stack context logic to local_span.py

Signed-off-by: Vasilii Novikov <novikov.vz@gmail.com>

* Simplify test_traced_function_decorator.py (#1)

These changes:

 - Remove redundant child.* = mock.MagicMock() statements

 - Replace mock.MagicMock() with mock.Mock()

 - Make tests use regular assert and Mock.assert_*() where possible

 - Replace self.assertRaises with pytest.raises
